briefTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blinded, Placebo-Controlled Study of Sorafenib in Patients With Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blinded, Placebo-controlled Study of Sorafenib in Patients With Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma
summary:
The purpose of the study is

* Find out if patients receiving Sorafenib will live longer
* Find out if Sorafenib has any effect on patient reported outcomes
* Find out if Sorafenib prevents the growth or shrinks liver tumors and / or their metastases
* Determine the pharmacokinetics (PK) in patients with liver cancer

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From randomization of the first subject until the data cut-off date approximately 23 months after start of randomization
